flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: As the blood dripped, falling to the ground, the earth it weeps! such pain, such sorrow, such grace! what has happened is a blessing, dont dwell on the past for this salvation aims for our future! so cry no more and do not fall to your knees in sorrow for our foundation is set! our eternity saved, our eternity changed this unique sacrifice! saved us. Christ is the perfect love of ours the salvation came from Him and no one denied Him! when He died for all to see! So look to the sky for he our salvation is here!

Christ is the perfect love of ours the salvation came from Him and no one denied Him! when He died for all to see! So look to the sky for he our salvation is here!
guide.title: salvation
